long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool creates a link for automated "1-click referrals" that you can place in your email signature.

By clicking on the link, it will create a pre-written email (that you created) and subject line. 

Then , all the referrer has to do is put in the email of the person they are referring and click "send". 

You will then automatically get "CC'ed" the lead with their email address for easy followup.

This Chrome extension can be used in countless other ways. 

Contact RodPotter16@gmail.com and let me know how you used it.

Enjoy
